name: Seed Dispensary
desc:
A special container obtained from Madame Ping. According to her, this dispensary has the power to "generate seeds"... That is to say, it can create the seeds of various plants according to their special traits, which can then be planted within the appropriate fields within your Serenitea Pot.
The plants that can be grown are as follows: Silk Flower, Sweet Flower, Cecilia, Glaze Lily, Windwheel Aster, Qingxin, Violetgrass, Valberry, Small Lamp Grass, Jueyun Chili, Carrot, Radish, Mint, Mushroom, Naku Weed, Horsetail, Snapdragon, Lotus Head, Calla Lily, Seagrass, Sea Ganoderma, Harra Fruit, Zaytun Peach, Sumeru Rose.

value.text:
World Quest "The Art of Horticulture"
(Requires the reward of Reputation Lv.3 in Inazuma)

value.name: Seed Dispensary
value.desc:
Seed Dispensary

A special container obtained from Madame Ping. According to her, this dispensary has the power to "generate seeds"...

customize.text:
To earn a seed, Seed Dispensary needs to be equipped first.
Each type of seed has maximum limit of 20.
The plant that grew up in the Serenitea Pot cannot generate a seed.
A Path of Value: Luxuriant Glebe

customize.name: Silk Flower Seed
customize.desc: A seed obtained from the Seed Dispensary. A quality seed full of life, just waiting to be planted in the fields of the Realm Within. After some time, it will grow into Silk Flowers.
